issues.title: Digital Burnout
issues.description: Mental exhaustion caused by the constant obligation to stay connected online.

persona.definition: The 'Always-On Executive' - Cannot differentiate between rest and availability.
persona.what_is_missing: Mental stillness and a clear boundary between 'self' and 'service'.
persona.core_need: Permission to be unavailable and offline 'unapologetic' time.
persona.communication_strategy: Communicate through asynchronous channels. Do not expect immediate replies. Use voice notes or physical letters to break the digital fatigue.

issues.title: Loneliness Pandemic
issues.description: A sense of chronic isolation deepened by the decrease in physical social connections.

persona.definition: The 'Isolated Urbanite' - Surrounded by people digitally but physically untouched.
persona.what_is_missing: Physical presence, eye contact, and 'third places' (community hubs).
persona.core_need: Touch, shared physical space, and the feeling of being 'seen' without a screen.
persona.communication_strategy: Prioritize face-to-face meetups. If calling, use video only if it enhances intimacy; otherwise, show up at their door.

issues.title: Financial Trauma
issues.description: Chronic stress caused by economic instability and the pressure of debt.

persona.definition: The 'Precarious Professional' - Lives in a state of 'survival mode' regarding survival resources.
persona.what_is_missing: Safety, predictability, and a nervous system that isn't on high alert.
persona.core_need: Financial literacy without shame and a stable environment where basic needs are guaranteed.
persona.communication_strategy: Be sensitive when suggesting activities that cost money. Focus on 'low-stakes' or free experiences to reduce their stress during social interactions.

issues.title: FOMO (Fear of Missing Out)
issues.description: Perceiving one's life as inadequate by constantly following others.

persona.definition: The 'Social Comparer' - Evaluates their internal reality against others' external highlights.
persona.what_is_missing: Gratitude for the 'now' and self-worth independent of social status.
persona.core_need: Authentic connection and JOMO (Joy of Missing Out) â€“ finding peace in solitude.
persona.communication_strategy: Share your own failures and 'boring' moments. De-mystify your life to help them realize your 'highlight reel' isn't reality.

issues.title: Performance Anxiety
issues.description: The pressure to be the 'best' at all times.

persona.definition: The 'High Achiever' - Feels their love is conditional upon their success.
persona.what_is_missing: Unconditional self-acceptance and the ability to play without a goal.
persona.core_need: Love that is not tied to 'output' or 'results'.
persona.communication_strategy: Praise their character and effort rather than their achievements. Tell them 'I'm glad you're here' rather than 'Good job on the project'.

issues.title: Attachment Issues
issues.description: Avoiding deep bonds due to fear of hurt.

persona.definition: The 'Reluctant Romantic' - Pushes people away when they get too close.
persona.what_is_missing: Trust in the stability of others and emotional safety.
persona.core_need: Consistency and space. They need to know they won't be trapped or abandoned.
persona.communication_strategy: Be consistent but not clingy. Give them a 'map' of your intentions. Slow and steady wins their trust.

persona.definition: The 'Seeker without a Map' - Has the 'what' but is missing the 'why'.
persona.what_is_missing: Spiritual or philosophical grounding; a reason to get out of bed.
persona.core_need: Meaning, purpose, and a connection to something larger than themselves.
persona.communication_strategy: Engage in deep, philosophical dialogue. Avoid 'small talk'. Ask them: 'What made you feel most alive today?'

persona.definition: The 'Digital Symptom Searcher' - Interprets every sensation as a threat.
persona.what_is_missing: Trust in their own body and the ability to sit with uncertainty.
persona.core_need: Reassurance that is grounded in reality, not logic (since logic rarely cures anxiety).
persona.communication_strategy: Acknowledge the fear is real. Don't argue with medical facts; instead, focus on calming the physical sensation of panic.

issues.title: Time Scarcity Stress
issues.description: The struggle to keep up with everything.

persona.definition: The 'Clock-Watcher' - Treats every second as a commodity to be spent.
persona.what_is_missing: Present-moment awareness and 'dead time' (unstructured time).
persona.core_need: Stillness and the realization that 'being' is as important as 'doing'.
persona.communication_strategy: Be punctual (to respect their stress) but model 'slow living'. Suggest activities that have no timer, like a walk in nature.

persona.definition: The 'Flawless Facade' - Terrified that a mistake will reveal they are 'worthless'.
persona.what_is_missing: The 'freedom to fail' and self-compassion.
persona.core_need: Acceptance of their humanity and flaws.
persona.communication_strategy: Purposefully share your own mistakes. Use humor to normalize 'messiness'. Avoid giving 'feedback' unless it's requested and softened.

issues.title: Decision Paralysis
issues.description: Inability to choose among many options.

persona.definition: The 'Infinite Scroller' - Scared of the 'opportunity cost' of a wrong choice.
persona.what_is_missing: Intuition and the ability to trust their 'gut'.
persona.core_need: Structure and narrowed options.
persona.communication_strategy: Don't ask 'What do you want to do?'. Instead, give two specific choices: 'Option A or Option B?'. Make the decision for them if they stall.

persona.definition: The 'Chronic People-Pleaser' - Their identity is built on being 'useful' to others.
persona.what_is_missing: Self-identity and individual desires.
persona.core_need: Assertion and the knowledge that they are allowed to have needs.
persona.communication_strategy: Explicitly tell them: 'It is okay to say no to this.' Check in on their comfort levels frequently. Don't take advantage of their 'yes'.

issues.title: Work-Life Imbalance
issues.description: Intrusion of work into private life.

persona.definition: The 'Office-at-Home Inhabitant' - Their bedroom feels like a cubicle.
persona.what_is_missing: Ritual transitions between 'roles' (worker vs. partner/parent).
persona.core_need: Physical separation and 'shutdown' rituals.
persona.communication_strategy: Do not talk about work during 'off' hours. If they bring it up, gently pivot the conversation back to the present moment.

issues.title: Imposter Syndrome
issues.description: Fear of being exposed as a fraud.

persona.definition: The 'Hidden Expert' - Feels like they 'tricked' everyone into hiring them.
persona.what_is_missing: Internalization of their own hard work and competence.
persona.core_need: Evidence-based validation and a supportive mentor.
persona.communication_strategy: When they succeed, point to the specific skill they used. Say 'You did that because you are skilled at X,' not 'You got lucky!'

persona.definition: The 'Good-Vibes-Only' Individual - Feels shame if they are sad.
persona.what_is_missing: Emotional depth and the ability to process grief.
persona.core_need: Permission to be 'not okay'.
persona.communication_strategy: Lead with vulnerability. Say, 'I've had a really hard day and I feel sad.' This gives them the 'license' to stop smiling.

issues.title: Parental Burnout
issues.description: Crushed under the pressure of perfect parenting.

persona.definition: The 'Intensive Parent' - Sacrifices their personhood for their children.
persona.what_is_missing: Adult identity and community support.
persona.core_need: Self-care that isn't just 'maintenance' and adult-only connection.
persona.communication_strategy: Don't ask about the kids first. Ask 'How are YOU doing?' Offer practical help (like a meal) rather than just 'advice'.

issues.title: Future Anxiety
issues.description: Fear of losing control over tomorrow.

persona.definition: The 'Catastrophizer' - Pre-lives every possible tragedy.
persona.what_is_missing: Trust in their own resilience (the ability to handle whatever happens).
persona.core_need: Grounding techniques and focus on 'controllables'.
persona.communication_strategy: Help them focus on the next 24 hours. Ask: 'What is one thing we can control today?'

persona.definition: The 'Cultural Nomad' - Feels like a ghost in a foreign land.
persona.what_is_missing: Familiarity and a sense of shared history.
persona.core_need: A new community that respects their heritage while welcoming them.
persona.communication_strategy: Ask about their home/background with genuine curiosity. Don't expect them to 'assimilate' immediately.

persona.definition: The 'Discarded Lover' - Left without an ending to the story.
persona.what_is_missing: Closure and the feeling of being worthy of a 'goodbye'.
persona.core_need: Certainty and directness in future relationships.
persona.communication_strategy: Be overly communicative. If you are going to be busy, tell them when you'll be back. Over-clarify your presence.

persona.definition: The 'Adult-Child' - Their past is constantly 'bleeding' into their present.
persona.what_is_missing: A sense of safety in the present moment.
persona.core_need: Compassion for the child they once were and trauma-informed therapy.
persona.communication_strategy: Watch for triggers. If they overreact, realize it's not about 'now'. Be the calm presence they didn't have as a child.

persona.definition: The 'Deadline Chaser' - Not lazy, just terrified of the task's weight.
persona.what_is_missing: Emotional regulation tools.
persona.core_need: To realize that 'done is better than perfect'.
persona.communication_strategy: Help them break tasks into ridiculously small steps. Don't nag; instead, offer to 'body double' (work alongside them).

persona.definition: The 'Self-Saboteur' - Convinced they are a 'bad' person at the core.
persona.what_is_missing: Self-love and an internal 'nurturer'.
persona.core_need: Unconditional positive regard.
persona.communication_strategy: Continuously remind them of their value. When they fail, show them that you are still there and that your opinion hasn't changed.

persona.definition: The '3 AM Thinker' - Their mind is a radio they can't turn off.
persona.what_is_missing: Zhi (willpower) and the ability to surrender to the day's end.
persona.core_need: Physical exhaustion and mental 'unloading'.
persona.communication_strategy: Don't send messages after 8 PM. Encourage 'low-stimulation' evenings when you are together.

persona.definition: The 'Disconnected Panic' - Uses the screen to avoid the pain of reality.
persona.what_is_missing: Real-world engagement and sensory experiences.
persona.core_need: Connection that is more rewarding than an algorithm.
persona.communication_strategy: Suggest 'phone-free' zones or activities. Don't lecture; just model the joy of being present.

persona.definition: The 'Mortality Obsesser' - Lives in a state of 'pre-mourning'.
persona.what_is_missing: Acceptance of life's cycles.
persona.core_need: Legacy and the feeling that their life has made a mark.
persona.communication_strategy: Focus on the 'now' and the legacy they are building. Don't dismiss the fear; talk about what makes life worth living today.

persona.definition: The 'Gaslit Survivor' - Has lost the ability to trust their own senses.
persona.what_is_missing: Self-trust and a 'reality anchor'.
persona.core_need: Validation of their reality and boundaries.
persona.communication_strategy: Be extremely transparent. Don't use 'word salad' or vague language. Be the 'consistent mirror' they need.

persona.definition: The 'Silent Roommate' - Lives in a state of emotional withdrawal.
persona.what_is_missing: Vulnerability and the safety to speak without being attacked.
persona.core_need: To feel heard and to have 'emotional bids' answered.
persona.communication_strategy: Start with small, non-confrontational 'emotional bids' (e.g., sharing a funny story). Rebuild the bridge slowly.

persona.definition: The 'Empty Winner' - Climbed the mountain and found it was cold at the top.
persona.what_is_missing: The next 'why' and horizontal (social) connections.
persona.core_need: To find value in 'being' rather than 'becoming'.
persona.communication_strategy: Help them find hobbies that they are 'bad' at but enjoy. Shift focus from 'legacy' to 'simple joy'.

persona.definition: The 'Burned-Out Empath' - Their 'care-tank' is completely empty.
persona.what_is_missing: Self-preservation and healthy detachment.
persona.core_need: To be cared for themselves and a 'news detox'.
persona.communication_strategy: Don't bring them more problems to solve. Be the person who takes care of THEM. Create a 'problem-free' zone.

persona.definition: The 'Perpetual Mourner' - The 'after' doesn't look like anything they want.
persona.what_is_missing: A new narrative and a place for their love to go.
persona.core_need: Time, space, and the permission to not 'get over it'.
persona.communication_strategy: Don't use platitudes like 'everything happens for a reason.' Just sit with them in the silence of the loss.

persona.definition: The 'Detached Partner' - Performance pressure has killed pleasure.
persona.what_is_missing: Intimacy without a 'goal'.
persona.core_need: Sensory connection and safety in the body.
persona.communication_strategy: Focus on non-sexual touch (hugging, holding hands). Take the 'final goal' off the table to reduce anxiety.

persona.definition: The 'Observer' - Feels like they are floating 5 feet behind their own body.
persona.what_is_missing: Grounding and a feeling of 'reality'.
persona.core_need: Sensory engagement (smell, touch, taste) to come back to the body.
persona.communication_strategy: Use their name often. Direct them to physical sensations (e.g., 'Can you feel the chair underneath you?'). Stay grounded for them.

persona.definition: The 'Modern Hermit' - Doesn't 'fit' anywhere in the algorithm.
persona.what_is_missing: Tribe and shared values.
persona.core_need: Acceptance for their unique, un-categorizable self.
persona.communication_strategy: Celebrate their 'weirdness'. Tell them: 'There is a space for exactly who you are here with me'.
